decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (A/01/001 Rev B, A/01/101 Rev E, A/01/102 Rev E, A/01/104 Rev C all dated May 2015. Planning Statement dated 11 August 2015 and Flood Risk Assessment Supporting Statement (no date). Received on 20 August 2015. Amended proposed plans and elevations reference A/02/101 Rev J, A/02/102 Rev I, A/02/104 Rev G. Received on 23 September 2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Erection of a single storey side infill extension to the house
